item.description: Brad White, a well known sailmaker and competitor, will be continuing his series of interactive racing presentations. Too often presentations only get to focus on the start and first upwind leg. "Down Wind Tactics and Strong Aggressive Finishes" will finally get us around the windward mark and help us through the rest of the race. Brad's presentations are always well attended with experienced racers that interact to make it informative for both veteran and less experienced sailors. FREE TO ALL
item.name: Racing Seminar at PCYC
